amendment.description: To restrict the availability of funds for the International Committee of the Red Cross.

vote.text: Amendment SA 162 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 162 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Fitzgerald. (consideration: CR S1411; text: CR S1411) To restrict the availability of funds for the International Committee of the Red Cross.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 162 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 162 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Fitzgerald.
